payload.content: OpenAI has released GPT-5.1, which features two distinct modes: 'Instant' for rapid chat interactions and 'Thinking' for more in-depth problem-solving.

name: OpenAI has released GPT-5.1, which features two distinct modes: 'Instant' for ra
content: OpenAI has released GPT-5.1, which features two distinct modes: 'Instant' for rapid chat interactions and 'Thinking' for more in-depth problem-solving.

payload.content: GPT-5.1 demonstrates significant improvements, including a warmer conversational style, enhanced instruction following capabilities, and adaptive thinking that allocates more processing time to complex tasks.

name: GPT-5.1 demonstrates significant improvements, including a warmer conversational
content: GPT-5.1 demonstrates significant improvements, including a warmer conversational style, enhanced instruction following capabilities, and adaptive thinking that allocates more processing time to complex tasks.

payload.content: Key areas of improvement in GPT-5.1 include gains in simple task accuracy, strategic decision-making, planning, and long-form writing.

name: Key areas of improvement in GPT-5.1 include gains in simple task accuracy, strat
content: Key areas of improvement in GPT-5.1 include gains in simple task accuracy, strategic decision-making, planning, and long-form writing.

payload.content: GPT-5.1 offers new personalization presets for adjusting tone and enabling role-based behavior.

name: GPT-5.1 offers new personalization presets for adjusting tone and enabling role-
content: GPT-5.1 offers new personalization presets for adjusting tone and enabling role-based behavior.
